mapper.insert: insert into run (meter, starttime, endtime, userid) values (#{meter,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT user.id uid,run.id rid,user.userno,user.username,user.usergrade, user.userbranch,run.meter,(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(run.endtime)-UNIX_TIMESTAMP(run.starttime)) time,run.starttime,run.endtime FROM user,run WHERE user.id=run.userid and user.deltime is null and user.id=#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY run.starttime
